title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: plain compound satin weave
creditline: Gift of the Museum of the Cranbrook Academy of Art
description: Flowers and acanthus leaves in gold and silver. Flowers shaded in red, blue, violet and green. Fragment is trimmed with yellow silk.
